segment.source: The following text is a result of select states:
segment.target: The following text is a result of select states:

segment.source: {VAR_SELECT, select, soccer { is the best soccer player.} hockey { is the best ice hockey player.} basketball { is the best basketball player.} }
segment.target: {VAR_SELECT, select, basketball { is the best basketball player.} hockey { is the best ice hockey player.} soccer { is the best soccer player.} }

segment.source: The following text is a result the same select states plus a fallback state:
segment.target: The following text is a result the same select states plus a fallback state:

segment.source: {VAR_SELECT, select, soccer { is the best soccer player.} hockey { is the best ice hockey player.} basketball { is the best basketball player.} other {Somebody is the best player.} }
segment.target: {VAR_SELECT, select, basketball { is the best basketball player.} hockey { is the best ice hockey player.} soccer { is the best soccer player.} other {Somebody is the best player.} }
